Comments_List: I learned how to model objects in CAD software, and perform analysis of the models using static loads, motion studies, fluid flows, as well as generate toolpaths for CNC machinery.

A lot of interesting tools and techniques were learned. The knowledge will be very helpful.

The software available for use on my personal machine was not compatible with the software on the lab computers (problems with version differences). There were also some assignments that had to be completed on the lab computers, which was difficult for me since I have to pick up a child from daycare early in the day.
Yes. The time required starts growing pretty quickly, so it can be a very busy semester, but the knowledge is very useful for other projects and courses.
